video.name: Instant Pot Vegan Chicken Saag (Soy Curls in Spinach Sauce) - Saucepan Option | VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Instant Pot Vegan Chicken Saag with Soy Curls. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/01/instant-pot-vegan-chicken-saag-soy-curls-in-spinach-sauce.html

Plain Saag (Just the greens dish), Saag with veggies like potatoes, Saag paneer (Palak tofu), and Saag with different meats are all similar dishes, but have subtle differences based on what they are paired with. 

To make this dish without Soy, use seitan, non soy chickin subs, veggies, potato to make Saag Aloo or cooked chickpeas or beans. To make it without nuts, use a nut-free non dairy yogurt or coconut cream. To make it without oil, omit the oil. See Saucepan option on the post linked above. 

1 POT Soycurls in Indian Spinach/greens Sauce. Use tempeh, baked tofu, other chikin substitutes for variation. Vegan Gluten-free Saagwala Recipe. Can be Soy-free and Nut-free 

Only Music version: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xUazW6E7SKs
Let me know which format you like better??

BUY MY COOKBOOK: http://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen 

MORE INSTANT POT RECIPES: https://www.veganricha.com/category/instant-pot

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5qhiuE1RjM

recipeIngredient: 4 to 5 oz spinach  (or spinach + other greens such as baby kale )
1/4 cup cashew cream or  (1/3 cup vegan plain yogurt)
cayenne and garam masala to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the onion through tomato and set aside. Blend the spinach/greens with 1/4 cup water. Pulse to make a coarse mixture and not a puree. (use 1/2 cup water if using hardy greens and using more).
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the onion through tomato and set aside. Blend the spinach/greens with 1/4 cup water. Pulse to make a coarse mixture and not a puree. (use 1/2 cup water if using hardy greens and using more).

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in saute mode. When hot, add cinnamon, cloves and bay leaf. Cook for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in saute mode. When hot, add cinnamon, cloves and bay leaf. Cook for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add blended onion tomato mix. Cook for 3 minutes, stir frequently. If it starts to burn, switch off saute for 2 mins, then switch on again if needed. Add the spices and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add blended onion tomato mix. Cook for 3 minutes, stir frequently. If it starts to burn, switch off saute for 2 mins, then switch on again if needed. Add the spices and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the greens, soy curls and salt. Add 1/2 cup water and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the greens, soy curls and salt. Add 1/2 cup water and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on Manual/Pressure Cook (hi) 8 to 10 minutes. Release after 5 mins. (If using tofu, potato or tempeh, 3 to 5 minutes pressure cook time is sufficient)
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on Manual/Pressure Cook (hi) 8 to 10 minutes. Release after 5 mins. (If using tofu, potato or tempeh, 3 to 5 minutes pressure cook time is sufficient)

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in cashew cream or yogurt and mix in. Add some water if needed and cook on saute until the mixture starts to boil. Add cayenne, garam masala, sugar and mix in. Adjust salt, spice and heat. Add fenugreek leaves if using.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in cashew cream or yogurt and mix in. Add some water if needed and cook on saute until the mixture starts to boil. Add cayenne, garam masala, sugar and mix in. Adjust salt, spice and heat. Add fenugreek leaves if using.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve garnished with pepper flakes with rice, quinoa or with flatbread or pita bread. Additional garnish: Drizzle Cashew cream and add some vegan butter per serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve garnished with pepper flakes with rice, quinoa or with flatbread or pita bread. Additional garnish: Drizzle Cashew cream and add some vegan butter per serving.
